metadata.title: DE ANNALES VIROLOGIE ENTEROVIRUS REPLICATION IN ILEAL EXPLANTS

abstract.original_text: Porcine enterovirus 3 replicated in explants of fcetal pig intestine, as was shown using photosensitization with neutral red to distinguish between inoculum and progeny virus. Progeny virus titres reached 105-10e/ml with 2-4 days' incubation.

sentences.segment_text: Porcine enterovirus 3 replicated in explants of fcetal pig intestine ,
as was shown using photosensitization with neutral red to distinguish between inoculum and progeny virus .
Progeny virus titres reached 105-10e / ml with 2-4 days ' incubation .
